alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike; Walthall; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 15 at 11:40AM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST TUESDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM TUESDAY TO 10 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures in the mid teens expected. * WHERE...In Louisiana, Pointe Coupee, West Feliciana, East Feliciana, St. Helena, Washington and Northern Tangipahoa Parishes. In Mississippi, Wilkinson, Amite, Pike and Walthall Counties. * WHEN...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, from 9 PM this evening to noon CST Tuesday. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, from 10 PM Tuesday to 10 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
